segments.text: I observe the angled view of the kitchen, showing the sink on the right.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman stands facing left, towel around a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Faucet runs, basin full, water cascades over the edge.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Puddle forms on the floor, touching her foot.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Cabinets to the left have open doors with the cookie jar inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy on two-step stool, body extended upward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One hand in jar, other holds plate; stool tilts back.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl nearby, arm raised, palm open toward the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Window above sink frames a tidy garden path and bushes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Curtains tied back, panes in small squares.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Stacks of dishes on counter to woman's right.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Lower cabinet doors show water streaks.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Wait, is that stool really that unstable? Oh wow, it is!
segments.speaker: PAR
